features.title: Latent Space Mapping
features.description: We analyze how AI models perceive your brand by examining the semantic associations in their training data. No guesswork—just observable patterns.

features.title: Visibility Scoring
features.description: Quantify your brand's Selection Rate—how often AI chooses you over competitors when answering user queries about your category.

features.title: Primary Bias Detection
features.description: Identify the assumptions AI systems make about your brand. Are they accurate? Outdated? We find the gaps between identity and perception.

features.title: Competitive Intelligence
features.description: See where you stand relative to competitors in the AI's knowledge layer. Understand who gets recommended—and why.

features.title: Schema.org Implementation
features.description: Structured data is the language AI understands. We build machine-readable architecture that makes your content parseable and trustworthy.

features.title: Entity Optimization
features.description: Strengthen your brand's knowledge graph presence. Clear entity relationships mean consistent AI representation across platforms.

features.title: Content Authority Signals
features.description: Establish topical authority through semantic consistency. We align your content with how AI models structure domain expertise.

features.title: Technical GEO Foundation
features.description: From SXO to GEO: we ensure your technical infrastructure supports AI discoverability and semantic interpretation.

features.title: AI Agent Compatibility
features.description: Prepare for the autonomous economy. We optimize your data for ACP, MCP, and UCP protocols—the handshakes AI agents use to transact.

features.title: Data Provenance
features.description: Verifiable, trustworthy data is the currency of AI commerce. We establish clear provenance chains that agents can validate.

features.title: Choosability Optimization
features.description: When an AI agent needs to select a vendor, you want to be chosen. We engineer the signals that make you the reliable choice.

features.title: Protocol-Ready Infrastructure
features.description: Future-proof your digital presence for the agent economy. Our architecture prepares you for transaction protocols that don't exist yet.
